attributes.action: Give all NHS staff a pay rise
attributes.additional_details: The NHS staff have been working through this coronavirus pandemic in order to help save our country. They are hero’s and are not thanked enough. Through this pandemic we have seen how much we rely on the NHS and how much they actually support the whole country. Some have literally died trying to save patients through this coronavirus pandemic. The NHS staff are putting themselves at risk every day of their lives and the least they deserve is a pay rise.
attributes.background: Give all NHS staff AT LEAST a 20% pay rise

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356
